altername_name: Final Fantasy Chronicles: Final Fantasy IV
name: Final Fantasy Chronicles
overview: Final Fantasy Chronicles features two previously-released ports by TOSE; Final Fantasy IV and Chrono Trigger. Chronicles was designed and directed by Kazuhiko Aoki, supervised by Fumiaki Fukaya, and produced by Akihiro Imai. It was created as a follow-up to Final Fantasy Anthology, a compilation of Final Fantasy V and Final Fantasy VI.
